summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current value of **DefineConstants** is kept.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current value of **DefineConstants** is kept.

value.span: Especifica se o valor atual da * * DefineConstants * * é mantida, que afeta a geração de assembly de destino; Se esse parâmetro for alterado, a API pública no assembly de destino pode ser alterada e a compilação de [! Arquivos include[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-MD.MD)] que fazem referência a tipos de locais podem ser afetados.

span.span: Specifies whether the current value of **DefineConstants** is kept, which affects target assembly generation; if this parameter is changed, the public API in the target assembly may be changed and the compilation of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] files that reference local types may be affected.
